author: timoline
body:
As far as I can see, there is no versioning in the configuration of JEA

It would be nice if we could add some versioning to the configuration
and then Get-PSSessionConfiguration should also output the version.

I'm not sure this is the correct repo for this?

comments.author: PaulHigin
comments.body:
WG-Security:
We are not sure about impact since configuration name can implicitly contain version information.  So we are labeling this as an enhancement issue for future consideration.

title: JEA Versioning PSSessionConfiguration
